steps.title: Choose a Challenge
steps.subtitle: Pick a challenge from our library of 10+ programming questions.

subSteps.description: 5 test cases to validate your answers.

steps.title: Write and Test Your Code
steps.subtitle: Write your code in the browser and test it using JDoodle Websocket APIs.

subSteps.description: Write your code in the browser.
Test your code using JDoodle Websocket APIs.
Submit your answers to all problems.

steps.title: Get Feedback
steps.subtitle: Get detailed feedback on your code and improve your skills.

subSteps.description: Validate your answers using JDoodle REST API.
Review test case results and learn from them.
Improve your programming skills and knowledge.

testimonials.name: John Doe
testimonials.testimonial: This app has helped me sharpen my coding skills and prepare for technical interviews. The gamified experience makes it fun and engaging.

testimonials.name: Jane Smith
testimonials.testimonial: I was able to significantly improve my coding abilities using this app. The problem bank has a great variety of challenges to choose from.

testimonials.name: Bob Johnson
testimonials.testimonial: The real-time code editor and built-in testing capabilities make solving problems a breeze. Highly recommend this app!

testimonials.name: Emily Chen
testimonials.testimonial: The detailed feedback provided after submitting solutions is extremely helpful in identifying areas for improvement. Love this app!

testimonials.name: Michael Lee
testimonials.testimonial: I was able to learn new programming concepts and improve my problem-solving skills using this app. The gamification features make it really fun!
